title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 05 May 2014 - XWiki
content:
<vmassol> has joined #xwiki

08:03 <Denis> has joined #xwiki  
08:16 <Denis> has quit  
08:24 <Denis> has joined #xwiki  
08:26 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
08:34 <vmassol> evalica: thanks  
08:34 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
08:41 <cjd> has joined #xwiki  
08:57 <msmeria> tmortagne: good morning  
08:57 <msmeria> do you have any idea when 6.0 will be released ?  
08:59 <tmortagne> msmeria: Hi  
08:59 <tmortagne> I was hopping to release it today  
08:59 <tmortagne> still need to review it's state and waiting a bit for everyone to be here to ask  
09:00 <msmeria> tmortagne: merci  
09:00 <tmortagne> in the meantime I will take care of the release note and translations update  
09:03 <tmortagne> hmm mflorea did not merged his branch yet  
09:04 <tmortagne> vmassol: Hi  
09:04 <tmortagne> I believe you forgot to delete feature-resource-and-wiki-modules branch in platform  
09:07 <Denis> has quit  
09:08 <Denis> has joined #xwiki  
09:11 <vmassol> tmortagne: hi  
09:11 <vmassol> ok checking  
09:11 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
09:12 <vmassol> BTW I'll merge the activeinstalls2 branch in master today  
09:12 <vmassol> (I have a first version working)  
09:12 <tmortagne> ok cool  
09:56 <tmortagne> mflorea: is there any Solr improvement done in 6.0 that was not also done in 5.4.x ?  
09:57 <tmortagne> (working on 6.0 final RN as you can see and it's compared to 5.4.4)  
09:59 <vmassol> has quit  
10:01 <mflorea> tmortagne: I haven't documented the improvements on the 5.4.4 release notes because 5.4.4 is a bug fixing release and I thought it will simply list the closed issues. So I think we still need to describe the improvements in 6.0 even if they were included in 5.4.4. The alternative is to move the doc from 6.0X to 5.4.4 RN  
10:02 <tmortagne> the problem is that the RN won't make much sense for someone actually upgrading from 5.4.4 to 6.0  
10:02 <mflorea> as for differences between 6.0 and 5.4.4, there may be some, but little, the most important is the fact that we upgraded Solr on 6.0  
10:05 <mflorea> then we need to move the doc to 5.4.4RN  
10:10 <mflorea> I reviewed the list http://jira.xwiki.org/issues/?jql=project%20%3D%20XWIKI%20AND%20fixVersion%20in%20%28%226.0%22%2C%20%226.1-milestone-1%22%2C%20%226.0-milestone-1%22%2C%20%226.0-milestone-2%22%2C%20%226.0-rc-1%22%29%20AND%20component%20in%20%28%22Search%20-%20Generic%22%2C%20%22Search%20-%20Solr%22%29%20AND%20status%20%3D%20Closed%20AND%20text%20~%20%22solr%22  
10:10 <mflorea> and everything has been ported to 5.4.x except the Solr/Lucene upgrade  
10:12 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
10:27 <tmortagne> mflorea: ok (the upgrade are in the 6.0 release note already)  
10:27 <tmortagne> same thing for most EM/DW stuff too  
10:31 <lucaa> has joined #xwiki  
10:33 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
10:47 <gdelhumeau> has joined #xwiki  
11:16 <Slashman> has quit  
11:23 <tmortagne> mflorea: what is the status of XWIKI-10268 ?  
11:24 <tmortagne> (I tough you had created a branch for it but could not find it)  
12:20 <mflorea> tortagne: almost done, I postponed the commit because I wanted to write some unit tests. I'll commit after lunch.  
12:20 <mflorea> tmortagne  
12:20 <mflorea> brb  
12:34 <tmortagne> mflorea: ok  
14:30 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
15:02 <evalica> has quit  
15:09 <lucaa> has quit  
15:26 <lucaa> has joined #xwiki  
15:58 <msmeria> has quit  
17:58 <Denis> has quit  
18:01 <mflorea> has quit  
18:03 <tmortagne> cool looks like we'll have a release tomorrow morning (GMT)  
18:04 <vmassol> there's one thing to agree on though  
18:04 <vmassol> it seems we have some IE10 issues  
18:04 <vmassol> we need to decide if that's blocker or not  
18:06 <tmortagne> XWIKI-10283 is marked blocker but does not have any fixfor  
18:06 <tmortagne> if it's a regression then I guess it's a blocker for 6.0  
18:07 <tmortagne> we should never mark anything blocker without a fix for since otherwise we just don't see them  
18:08 <vmassol> agreed  
18:09 <vmassol> ahah it's me who did it :)  
18:11 <tmortagne> ( O:-) )  
18:27 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
18:30 <gdelhumeau> on a fresh instance: http://hastebin.com/ixuriwehag.css  
18:41 <tmortagne> gdelhumeau: you don't have more than that ?  
18:41 <gdelhumeau> nope  
18:41 <gdelhumeau> I was creating a new document with an empty PanelClass object  
18:42 <tmortagne> "Failed to retrieve panel document" does not sounds like the lowest possible cause  
18:42 <tmortagne> all I can suggest is to find where is this message and put a breakpoint to understand what it really means  
18:50 <cjd> has quit  
19:09 <abusenius> has joined #xwiki  
19:23 <Slashman> has quit  
19:29 <Denis> has joined #xwiki  
20:23 <lucaa> has quit  
20:24 <lucaa> has joined #xwiki  
20:51 <gdelhumeau> has quit  
20:52 <tmortagne> has quit  
21:05 <lucaa> has quit  
22:04 <vmassol> seems something is off with my activeinstalls code….  
22:04 <vmassol> It worked locally with my tests but is failing with http://extensions.xwiki.org/activeinstalls/installs/install2/\_search for some reason… looking into it  
22:07 <vmassol> ouch I think I know  
22:08 <vmassol> I've used ES 1.1 locally and it seems we're using 1.0.1 on xwiki.org  
22:22 <vmassol> mflorea: fyi I've just built XE from sources (master) and I got the following at startup: https://gist.githubusercontent.com/vmassol/5896f97bd000cbf52db3/raw/gistfile1.txt  
22:26 <mflorea> vmassol: I think you asked me the same thing some time ago. Solr doesn't do any modifications. The issue is that someone else is modifying the document (the list of objects in this case) while Solr indexer reads it. I know for sure that the REST resources are modifying directly the cached document instead of cloning it. I'm not sure it's rest in this case, but I'm pretty sure it's not Solr's fault  
22:27 <vmassol> ah ok didn't realize it was the same problem as before, but we'll need to analyze it and find out the problem  
22:28 <mflorea> the exception is thrown here https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/blob/master/xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-search/xwiki-platform-search-solr/xwiki-platform-search-solr-api/src/main/java/org/xwiki/search/solr/internal/metadata/AbstractSolrMetadataExtractor.java#L348  
22:28 <mflorea> it simply iterates the list of properties of an object  
22:31 <vmassol> ok seems xwiki.org's ES instance has some invalid data in it now…. http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/ActiveInstalls/TotalCounterValue I need to figure this out....  
22:45 <vmassol> has quit  
22:45 <lucaa> has joined #xwiki  
22:58 <mflorea> has quit  
23:11 <lucaa> has quit  
23:36 <abusenius> has quit
